messages.subject: Learning Naturally
messages.msgSnippet: I am looking forward to unschooling my 5 year old daughter who has been in a private Christian school for the past year. She seems excited too and asks
messages.messageBody:
I am looking forward to unschooling my 5 year old daughter who has
been in a private Christian school for the past year. She seems
excited too and asks frequently when we're going to get started.
Little does she know that as she's weighing the fruit in the grocery
store that we've been started and that learning never stops.

Looking forward to the new year,
Latoya
***
Natural Family Boutique
www.naturalfamilyboutique.com/?Latoya
Parenting, naturally...
